title: GOING TO SERVICE FOR SERVICING
memory_verse: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service. Rom. 12:1
meaning: Going to service is attending service, attending bible studies, prayer meetings, and all the set programs by which God who oversees everybody has created through his underlay shepherd (the Spiritual head of the church) As a Christian that is running the heavenly race, God knows that there are certain things that you might lack in your system, as a result of misuse, over use or abuse so he set church programs to help you revitalise your hope, faith, strength.
